data.title: Member states EU/EEA
data.meta_description: Find out which countries are members of the European Union (EU) or the European Economic Area (EEA)
data.text:
The following countries are members of the European Union (EU) or the European Economic Area (EEA)

Belgium

Bulgaria

Cyprus

Denmark (excluding the Faroe Isles and Greenland)

Germany

Estonia

Finland

France (including French Guiana, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Mayotte, La Reunion and Saint-Martin)- *1

Greece

Hungary

Ireland

Italy

Croatia

Latvia

Liechtenstein - (EEA)

Lithuania

Luxembourg

Malta

The Netherlands (excluding Aruba, Cura√ßao, Sint Maarten, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba)

Norway - (EEA)

Austria

Poland

Portugal (including the Azores and Madeira)

Romania

Slovenia

Slovakia

Spain (including the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands)

Czech Republic

Iceland - (EEA)

Sweden

*1 - French overseas departments

Nationals of French Guiana, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Mayotte and La Reunion are French citizens and also EU/EEA citizens.

Switzerland

Switzerland is not an EU/EEA member state. However, Swiss nationals have the same rights of residence as EU/EEA citizens.

Andorra, Monaco, San Marino and Vatican City

Nationals of Andorra, Monaco, San Marino or Vatican City are not EU/EEA citizens.

United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (including Gibraltar, excluding the Channel Islands, BNO passport holders and Isle of Man)

From 31 January 2020 the United Kingdom is no longer an EU/EEA member state. Nationals of the United Kingdom are not EU/EEA citizens.

BNO passport holders
